banner.headline: I develop web and mobile applications.
banner.description: I'm a software developer who has worked for clients ranging from startups to SMEs, on applications from energy renovation to virtual wardrobe sharing

aboutme.headline: About me
aboutme.first_paragraph: After exploring the digital, growth & automation field for 2 years while supporting startups, I decided to dive into web development by joining Le Wagon in summer 2021.
aboutme.second_paragraph: I joined a web & mobile development agency where I worked on various projects with Ruby On Rails and Vue.js/Ionic for Effy (SME) and Vera (Mobile startup)
aboutme.third_paragraph: I continued as a freelancer while becoming a teacher at Le Wagon and developed an MVP for Logicaps (Real estate startup)
aboutme.fourth_paragraph: Here are the technologies I've worked with recently

lewagon.title: Web Development Bootcamp
lewagon.details: 9-week intensive training on the following topics: Algorithms, JavaScript, SQL, JS and creation of a web project in Ruby On Rails

second_ebi.title: Biotech & Entrepreneurship Engineer
second_ebi.details: Project launch & competitions, Innovation, Marketing (Digital, B2B)

logicaps.name: Logicaps
missions: Creation of ten key features (WebSocket chatrooms, budget tracking dashboard, document categorization, condo management, etc.)
Complete Stripe integration (plans & subscriptions) and OCR for document extraction
Various management: Docker, Sidekiq, Redis, anonymized analytics, Sentry, translations, etc.

captive.name: Captive
missions: For Effy (2 energy renovation web applications), Participation in technical debt reduction and complex bug resolution: Application maintenance and version upgrades: Rails 5, 6, 7, Ruby 3, Sidekiq 7

For Vera (Virtual wardrobe mobile app) Multi-platform SSO improvement (Account / user separation), Creation of outfit suggestion algorithm and SQL improvement, Fullstack feature integrations: REST API, Vue.js/Ionic integration (Outfit likes, follow), Test creation (Rspec, Cypress, Jest)

Other projects: Backend features in TDD (unit tests, integration), SQL and API performance optimization, Rights management & admin features, Soft-delete addition on key models, Technical documentation update and maintenance

freelance.name: Freelancing
missions: For Mister Auto: Lead between IT department and business teams for implementing the existing transactional system to Emarsys (SAP). Design system definition and implementation, creation of a hundred HTML/CSS components with business logic.

For Goodwill: Design of an API enrichment engine (Via 4 API endpoints) to enrich 13k accounting firms to obtain contact details of company executives. Contact cleaning and segmentation, Creation of automation for LinkedIn prospecting, email follow-up (Ruby On Rails, REST API, script, Google Sheets)
Various Growth missions: Outbound prospecting system setup, SEO strategy, SEO audit, prospecting training, website setup, etc.

lewagon.name: Le Wagon
missions: +15 days as teacher and project mentor
+50 days as assistant for Le Wagon students
Ticket resolution, concept explanation: Ruby algorithms, OOP, SQL, Front-end (HTML/CSS/JS), Ruby On Rails, Heroku, Git, Github, etc.

cartelis.name: Cartelis
missions: Consulting mission: Operational lead for implementing a B2B prospecting system: targeting different customer segments, building targeted prospect database, automated multi-channel contact (email, LinkedIn), and performance tracking setup: CPL: 15
Google Sheet resource development: Automated firebase tagging plan, digital project planning, marketing action plan
Writing articles on data/digital topics (tool comparison, lead scoring, prospecting...)

logicaps.title: Logicaps
logicaps.description: Logicaps MVP, real estate joint ownership management through documents
features: Creation of ten key features (WebSocket chatrooms, budget tracking dashboard, document categorization, condo management, etc.)
Complete Stripe integration (plans & subscriptions) and OCR for document extraction
Various management: Docker, Sidekiq, Redis, anonymized analytics, Sentry, translations, etc.

vera.title: Vera
vera.description: iOS and Android mobile app: Virtual wardrobe and social dimension like Instagram (Account, Like, Follow, Share, Profile)
features: Multi-platform SSO improvement (Account / user separation)
Creation of outfit suggestion algorithm (SQL Performance)
Fullstack feature integrations: REST API, Vue.js/Ionic integration (Outfit likes, follow, outfits)
Test creation (Rspec, Cypress, Jest)

quelleenergie.title: Quelleenergie
quelleenergie.description: Quelleenergie is a Back-office/ERP platform for geolocation, matchmaking, billing, etc. for French craftsmen
features: SQL query optimization on PostgreSQL and MySQL (geolocation/matching, data exports)
Server logs redesign and API documentation for tech teams
Data migrations with strong business impact (hundreds of thousands of entries)
Fullstack feature additions

annuaire.title: Annuaire RGE
annuaire.description: RoR application for daily updates of all 300k+ French craftsmen, their companies, certifications
features: Technical debt reduction (Table size reduction, API doc redesign...)
Proactive bug monitoring (Datadog, GCP) and complex bug fixes (APIs, tool sync, CRON & Jobs)
Backend features addition, active_admin
Application maintenance and version upgrade: Rails 5.2 to 7, Ruby 3
Data migrations with strong business impact (hundreds of thousands of entries)

misterauto.title: Mister Auto
misterauto.description: Consultant for migrating existing transactional system to Emarsys (SAP)
features: Coordination between IT department and business team to manage country/product specificities, etc.
Integration of 45 emails in 19 languages, and rule management with ESL language
Technical documentation writing and training for 15 people, to make teams autonomous
Result: 99.7% deliverability for +150k emails/month sent

goodwill.title: Goodwill
goodwill.description: Goodwill is a digital services company for accountants
features: Design of an API enrichment engine (Via 4 API endpoints) to enrich 13k accounting firms to obtain contact details of company executives.
Contact cleaning and segmentation
Creation of automation for LinkedIn prospecting, email follow-up (Ruby On Rails, REST API, script, Google Sheets)

stock-alert.title: Action Alert
stock-alert.description: iOS and Android mobile app: Stock price alerts
features: Creation of a Ruby on Rails server with JWT authentication and REST API
Creation of an iOS and Android mobile app with React Native and Expo
Coming: Ability to set a price alert on a current stock. 10-second polling to retrieve data.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Simple portfolio that traces my journey, my projects
features: Translation with vue-i18n that defines all site content, auto translation button
Mobile responsive implementation
